job_history.work_description: Meet weekly to report on High Dollar Inpatient accounts, and Financial Advocate roles in helping self-pay patients. Interim supervisor for additional outpatient department located at Downtown PH. Work on Rapid Improvement team to reduce denials within the CDS.

Implement monthly meetings to bring unity to PSR department. Orchestrate change to departmental culture to create awareness of other hospital areas, and build on teamwork. Attend high dollar meetings and create weekly strategies for Inpatient collections.

Establish the expectation of cross-training for current and new employees for Rio Rancho, and eventually to all areas within the CDS. Improve employee retention for Patient Access in Rio Rancho. Improve employee satisfaction scores for Patient Access in Rio Rancho.
Ensure ER coverage and staffing levels are appropriate for 24/7 coverage. Implement on-call process for employees. Partake in RMC process improvement on employee hiring and retention.

Work as registrar for the following departments: Outpatient, ER, Day Surgery, PASS, Inpatient, GI Lab, Pain & Spine, Physical Therapy, Infusion, and Patient Service Representative. Assist with hiring and selecting applicants for open positions. Train new hires.

Work as registrar for the following departments: Outpatient, ER, Day Surgery, and GI Lab. Register patients in MPAC for hospital services. Verify patient eligibility via POL, and third party applications.
Manage warehouse when coverage is needed. Conduct one-on-one and team training for certifications. Act as a liaison for all new hires including HR functions.
Manager of service related aspects including repairs, ordering, and scheduling. Provide excellent customer service in selling and furniture related issues.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including supervisory positions in multiple departments, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has managed teams in various roles, including as a supervisor and department manager, showing strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has provided excellent customer service in various roles, including as a service department manager and registrar, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Has trained new hires and conducted team training sessions, showing strong proficiency in training and development.

skills.name: Project Leadership
skills.explanation: Has participated in process improvement projects and implemented changes in departmental culture, indicating a solid working proficiency in project leadership.
